description:
A console utility for computing and verifying hash sums of files.

RHash (Recursive Hasher) is a console utility for computing and verifying hash sums of files.
It supports CRC32, MD4, MD5, SHA1, SHA256, SHA512, Tiger, DC++ TTH, BitTorrent BTIH, ED2K, AICH, GOST R 34.11-94, RIPEMD-160, HAS-160, EDON-R 256/512, Whirlpool and Snefru-128/256 algorithms.
Hash sums are used to ensure and verify integrity of large volumes of data for a long-term storing or transferring.
